name: Temple Adventure Runner 2017
description:
Temple Adventure Platformer 2017 is an interesting, thrilling jump and run plat-former adventure! With a combination of jumping games and running games features, all packed into the well-known platformer gameplay, Temple Adventure Platformer can really entertain you to the fullest. No need to pay to open
new levels, they are all free just keep completing the levels to open the new ones (Free)

CRISP HD GRAPHICS & SMOOTH GAMEPLAY
Temple Adventure Platformer is based on the classic platformer gameplay. However, it is redesigned, polished and exquisitely beautiful to look and feel astounding. Believe us, you’ll love the 2d platformer gameplay and how it feels through the different worlds. It’s a run and jump experience you don’t want to miss!

CAN YOU PASS THROUGH ALL WORLDS?
We have prepared 5 different worlds with amazing graphics & special effects. Explore them and try to pass them all. Will you manage to pass them through knowing there are tons of obstacles and enemies along the way? Set it as a goal and have fun with this amazing platform adventure game.


5 DIFFERENT WORLDS AND RUN THROUGH 100 SMOOTH AND COLORFUL ALL LEVELS ARE FREE!

+ thrilling and fun running jungle temple adventure
+ frenzied, addicting and fast game experience
+ easy game-play with one-touch controls

FEATURES OF TEMPLE ADVENTURE PLATFORMER 2017:
+ various challenges, 5 amazing, mysterious worlds and 100 running levels
+ beautiful, stunning and smooth graphics
+ great music and intense sound effects
+ exciting spirit of classic running platform adventures
+ easy and unique one-tap control game-play
+ very small APK file size for faster download
----------------------------------------------------------

Temple Adventurer is stranded in jungle ruin world. Help the hero running through jungle and temples and try to find all treasures.

Run for your life and escape all troubles and obstacles. Collect coins, explore different areas and run along cliffs, traps and barriers.

How far can YOU run? Can YOU beat the leader-board high scores? Test your treasure trapping skills now!

The temple jump game is probably the best combination of free platform games and jumping games in 2017. See why!! Enjoy this addictive mega adventure plat-former running game hit!
